焉得知？」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_004-2a>¶

# src: LY 04.02; tr. CH
4.2子曰：¶
「不仁者

# src: LY 04.03; tr. CH
4.3子曰：¶
「唯仁者
能好人，¶
能惡人。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_004-4a>¶

觀過，¶

4.8子曰：¶
「朝聞道，¶
夕死可矣。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_004-9a>¶	KR1a0093_001:43b:7:7:2,KR1a0107_007:35a:5:7:1,KR1a0117_018:19a:5:26:11,KR1a0138_003:41a:7:11:116,KR1a0139_072:17b:6:19:202,KR1b0016_010:35a:3:5:0,KR1d0051_039:6a:4:12:2,KR1d0057_002:40b:6:10:0,KR1d0057_016:7b:1:12:0,KR1d0057_016:9a:4:2:0,KR1d0060_003:18a:8:11:4,KR1d0067_006:18b:1:6:7,KR1g0004_003:4a:8:6:17,KR1g0004_003:22a:8:19:75,KR1g0005_007:7b:4:4:52,KR1g0009_002:12a:1:6:3,KR1h0004_004:1a:48:1:8,KR1h0005_002:13a:1:9:0,KR1h0006_002:29b:1:6:35,KR1h0006_002:29b:2:7:35,KR1h0007_004:4b:8:6:11,KR1h0010_000:1b:5:7:4,KR1h0010_000:7b:3:12:16,KR1h0012_002:23b:5:6:68,KR1h0012_002:23b:8:17:69,KR1h0015_002:11a:8:6:6,KR1h0015_016:27b:2:39:6,KR1h0017_004:15a:7:6:54,KR1h0017_004:15a:9:20:55,KR1h0017_004:15b:1:13:55,KR1h0017_004:15b:2:7:55,KR1h0017_004:15b:3:4:55,KR1h0017_004:16b:7:18:56,KR1h0017_004:17a:9:1:59,KR1h0017_008:29b:7:10:109,KR1h0017_015:10a:3:12:51,KR1h0017_031:20b:5:12:45,KR1h0020_001:25a:11:6:125,KR1h0020_003:3b:3:4:21,KR1h0021_000:43a:8:6:193,KR1h0021_000:43b:1:2:194,KR1h0024_007:16a:1:16:6,KR1h0024_007:16b:1:3:6,KR1h0024_007:16b:1:18:6,KR1h0024_030:17b:5:24:4,KR1h0025_014:17a:3:7:4,KR1h0026_002:20b:5:6:72,KR1h0028_005:43b:8:6:96,KR1h0028_027:31a:5:3:137,KR1h0028_027:31a:5:25:137,KR1h0032_005:7a:2:16:11,KR1h0033_006:24a:7:10:326,KR1h0034_005:41a:7:6:96,KR1h0034_027:32a:7:10:137,KR1h0038_006:26a:7:6:96,KR1h0038_028:23a:10:19:137,KR1h0039_002:42b:5:4:214,KR1h0043_004:13a:6:6:25,KR1h0043_004:13b:4:12:26,KR1h0043_004:13b:5:14:26,KR1h0043_015:14a:7:34:33,KR1h0043_034:39b:3:11:136,KR2a0007_075:5b:3:15:2,KR2a0007_075:5b:4:6:2,KR2a0017_031:7b:7:7:2,KR2a0020_052:20b:3:12:4,KR2a0024_047:4b:8:10:4,KR2b0003_017:4b:7:4:3,KR2b0003_028:4b:7:4:116,KR2b0003_030:4b:7:4:112,KR2b0003_030:4b:7:4:268,KR2b0007_024:26a:8:5:4,KR2b0007_096:5a:6:10:2,KR2b0007_207:18b:4:3:3,KR2b0037_016:17a:7:28:0,KR2b0037_052:37b:6:20:0,KR2c0001_015:34a:3:17:10,KR2c0001_030:72a:1:19:13,KR2d0006_114:83b:3:14:6,KR2d0006_145:2b:2:17:7,KR2d0006_161:16b:2:16:10,KR2d0006_171:104a # src: LY 04.13; tr. Ch
4.13子曰：¶
「能以禮讓為國，於從政乎	KR1g0018_001:9a:4:9:21,KR1h0004_004:1a:67:1:13,KR2a0009_069:14a:1:7:6,KR2a0009_114:5b:5:18:7,KR2d0002_017:4b:1:3:9,KR2f0039_076:9a:3:9:2,KR2g0035_003:19b:1:14:4,KR3k0012_424:2a:2:10:6,KR3k0012_999:2a:2:10:11410,KR3k0013_100:11a:8:12:2,KR3k0055_280:42b:8:21:14,KR4h0061_015:8a:7:4:37,KR4h0122_010:36b:3:4:70,KR4h0122_027:29b:3:7:65,KR4h0132_091:13b:5:8:12
何有？¶

「參乎！¶

子出，¶

「何謂也？」¶
曾子曰：¶

可謂孝矣。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_004-22a>¶	KR1a0102_005:21a:1:8:0,KR1a0121_004:27b:5:11:1,KR1a0135_004:11b:2:9:2,KR1a0143_003:25b:6:39:1,KR1b0010_010:2b:5:11:0,KR1c0009_002:10b:7:15:7,KR1c0012_015:3a:3:6:0,KR1c0015_002:6b:8:35:14,KR1c0022_003:18b:4:7:10,KR1c0028_002:23a:7:3:153,KR1c0030_004:18a:8:7:62,KR1c0033_002:11a:8:16:2,KR1c0035_002:20a:1:4:90,KR1c0041_009:60b:2:7:43,KR1c0041_018:44a:7:30:57,KR1c0042_003:6a:5:25:2,KR1c0044_005:36a:2:8:164,KR1c0045_004:36b:3:12:190,KR1c0045_013:9b:3:13:27,KR1c0061_003:26b:3:5:18,KR1d0013_004:96a:5:8:25,KR1d0017_003:42b:4:3:1,KR1d0051_004:10a:6:8:31,KR1d0051_018:29a:2:15:114,KR1d0051_064:38b:1:13:12,KR1d0052_025:1a:604:1:74,KR1d0052_025:1a:622:1:76,KR1d0052_031:1a:170:1:24,KR1d0052_031:1a:178:1:25,KR1d0052_031:1a:183:1:26,KR1d0053_048:8a:2:18:1,KR1d0053_048:10a:6:7:1,KR1d0053_048:10b:6:8:1,KR1d0053_048:11a:8:7:1,KR1d0053_051:23a:5:3:1,KR1d0053_051:23b:1:16:1,KR1d0053_051:23b:6:21:1,KR1d0054_014:13a:1:2:1,KR1d0054_014:13a:2:36:1,KR1d0054_014:13a:8:13:1,KR1d0054_015:15a:1:17:1,KR1d0054_015:15a:2:9:1,KR1d0054_015:15a:4:22:1,KR1d0054_015:15a:8:37:1,KR1d0057_003:20b:3:15:0,KR1d0057_112:40a:2:7:0,KR1d0057_113:8b:4:7:0,KR1d0057_113:9a:1:20:0,KR1d0057_113:9b:6:15:0,KR1d0057_122:3b:3:4:0,KR1d0057_122:3b:4:13:0,KR1d0057_122:5b:2:9:0,KR1d0057_122:6a:6:1:0,KR1d0057_122:6b:6:16:0,KR1d0058_031:7b:1:5:2,KR1d0058_031:7b:6:15:2,KR1d0058_031:8a:3:9:2,KR1d0058_031:8a:6:16:2,KR1d0058_031:24b:1:5:5,KR1d0058_031:24b:6:15:5,KR1d0058_031:25a:3:9:5,KR1d0058_031:25a:6:16:5,KR1d0059_008:44a:6:11:3,KR1d0059_008:44b:4:4:3,KR1d0059_009:23a:6:9:5,KR1d0059_009:23b:2:2:5,KR1d0059_009:23b:4:7:5,KR1d0060_022:48a:4:9:7,KR1d0060_022:48b:2:3:7,KR1d0060_025:11a:3:4:3,KR1d0060_025:11b:3:15:3,KR1d0060_025:12a:1:9:3,KR1d0060_025:12a:6:2:3,KR1d0060_025:12a:7:4:3,KR1d0064_001:74a:2:4:16,KR1d0064_002:1a:5:15:2,KR1d0064_002:6b:1:9:3,KR1d0067_051:7b:2:7:0,KR1d0067_051:7b:7:21:0,KR1d0067_051:8b:1:18:0,KR1d0067_055:10a:3:4:9,KR1d0067_055:10a:8:9:9,KR1d0067_055:10b:4:15:9,KR1d0067_055:1 # src: LY 04.24; tr. CH
4.24子曰：¶

# src: LY 04.25; tr. CH
4.25子曰：¶
「德不孤，¶
必有鄰。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_004-27a>¶

# src: LY 04.26; tr. CH
4.26子游曰：¶
「事君數，¶
斯辱矣；¶
朋友數，¶
斯疏矣。」
